tool_description: Analyzes database object dependencies and determines the correct order for creating, modifying, or dropping schema objects.

schema_metadata.description: JSON string containing database schema structure

operation_type.description: Type of operation being analyzed (create, drop, modify)

include_circular_detection.description: Whether to detect and report circular dependencies

error_messages: Invalid schema metadata: Provide valid JSON schema structure.
Invalid operation type: Use create, drop, or modify.
Circular dependency detected: Schema contains circular references that must be resolved.
Missing dependency information: Schema metadata lacks required relationship information.
usage: Provide schema_metadata and specify operation_type to analyze dependencies. Enable include_circular_detection to identify problematic circular references.

execution_order.description: Ordered list of database objects for safe execution

dependency_graph.description: JSON representation of the complete dependency graph

circular_dependencies.description: List of detected circular dependency chains
